en.title: Download the app now to continue uploading
en.content:
From the next Chrome update, uploading to Quirkbots will only be possible using the app. Please download it as soon as possible!
[Download the app now.](/download/)

ja.title: Download the app now to continue uploading
ja.content:
From the next Chrome update, uploading to Quirkbots will only be possible using the app. Please download it as soon as possible!
[Download the app now.](/download/)

sv.title: LADDA NER APPEN NU FÖR ATT KUNNA FORTSÄTTA ANVÄNDA QUIRKBOT
sv.content:
För att kunna du ska kunna fortsätta ladda upp din kod till Quirkbot måste du använda appen.
Nästa uppdatering från chrome kommer ta bort möjligheten för oss att använda webbtjänsten.
[Ladda ner appen nu.](/download/)

pt_BR.title: Baixe o aplicativo para continuar usando Quirkbots
pt_BR.content:
A partir da próxima atualização do Chrome, upload para Quirkbots só será possível com o aplicativo. Faça o download o quanto antes!
[Fazer o download agora.](/pt-br/download/)

zh-Hans-CN.title: 立即下载应用程序以便继续上传功能
zh-Hans-CN.content:
自下一次Chrome更新后  ，您将只能使用我们的应用程序来上传编程文件至Quirkbot。请尽快下载应用程序
[立即下载应用程序](/zh-hans-cn/download/)
